Rapid Cash
==========

    Rapid cash is atoken system where user will earn tokens for their contributions to the company

Functionality
-------------

    - Admin, will be able to publish the token supply every year/Quarter
    - A dashboard the will show the balances of every account, like a tree, cash distribution chart
    - Redeeming mechanism of the tokens should be set.
    - Admin - will be able to distribute token to any users
    - Employee, will be able to send(optional) or recieve the tokens
    - Employee will be able to see the top n token holder in the home page
    - Employee should be able to see his balance.
    - Employee should be able to raise a reimbursment by sending the tokens back to finance/admin
    - Should be able to see the history of transactions.
